title: I want to sugest a function for mini map and I think it should be helpful.
body:
So, sometime i got a stupid move when moving because of wrong clicking on mini map, I tried to gank bottom lane but there could be 2 second late if I do a wrong click to the top lane on mini map. can you make an option that make mini map to viewonly? Or left click only to move the viewpot to that place, i want to disable right click on my mini map...

Thanks alot~!
(I'm new to this forum, please move this if I post in wrong board. please..!)

replies.body: DTN to the rescue!  He's provided a great option to toggle movement on the minimap.  As an additional option, you can also move the minimap to the other side of the screen via in-game settings.  Let us know if you have any questions!

Hey CyberGameDakmil,

Actually, this is already a feature! Open up your options window (Esc) and go to the **Interface** tab. Scroll down halfway and you'll see a **Minimap** section with the checkbox **Allow Minimap Movement**. Uncheck that and you're good to go!
